Text: How can the crack be used???? I dont find no temp folder...
What folder to open in temp????, problem, who has cracked, write please!!!!

Okay guys, I'm seeing this question on a lot of these torrents. First of all, you're complete noobs. Second of all, depending on your operating system, the folder you need to go to will be under something like C:\Users\[YourAccountName]AppData\Local\Temp
You have to have hidden files visible to see this folder. The rest should be straight forward, even for you...
I have FSX on Vista and have no problem loading it up !! its easy !!
does anyone want me to upload a rip file of this? the windows 7 users dont know how cuz its different

WINDOWS 7 USERS !!! :

Program files\Users\ (account name) \AppData\Roaming

You're welcome
